category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 17 (Sports Club Committee)
contents: Article 17 (Sports Club Committee) The Sports Club Committee shall respond to the president's advice on the following matters. Revised 2018. 4. 25., 2018. 7. 9., 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5. 1. Deleted 2019. 1. 31. 2. Matters related to sports club development and promotion 3. Sports Matters pertaining to the revitalization of club competitions and events 4. Matters pertaining to sports club operation and support 5. Matters pertaining to recommendations for recognition of those who have contributed to the development of sports clubs 6. Other matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the Sports Club Committee and submitted by the president [Article Moved from Article 16, previous Article 17 moved to Article 18 2017. 4. 3.] [Title revised 2018. 4. 25.]
